column4: Using all caps won't make people notice your question more, it will however make people who would otherwise want to help you less enthusiastic about doing so.
I understand that that is frustrating, but using all caps isn't productive. Have you tried http://askubuntu.com or http://ubuntuforums.org ?
Repeating your comments is also not productive.
I have seen your comment, I don't have time to help you at the moment. Please try to be more patient and polite (with me, and with the channel as a whole. We're all volunteers).
